name: Run Doom
description:
The Rundoom is a 2D shooter arena game where you play as Daun, a dice shooter guy who has to defeat multiple enemies that spawn on a small arena. Receiving damage won't be a problem, it will just make you stronger!

This is a project that happened during the GMTK Game Jam 2022 in two days made by a team of four former members.

Team Members:

  • Àlex Navarro Alcolea - Artist / Designer.
    • Twitter
    • LinkedIn
    • Portfolio
  • Adrià Pujol i Sierra - Programmer / Designer.
    • Twitter
    • LikedIn
  • Alex Ruiz Rabasseda - Programmer / Designer.
    • LinkedIn
    • GitHub
  • Alejandro Vega Castro - Technical artist / Designer. 
    • Twitter
    • LinkedIn

BUG ALERT!! The game makes you invincible if you dash on 6 or 5 health! If you wanna enjoy the full experience of the game try to avoid dashing above 4 health. We're sorry :(
